p:
A formazan absorbance is in direct correlation with tumor cell viability. The percentage growth (PG) of cell lines was calculated according to the following formulas:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$${\text{If }}\left( {{\text{A test }}{-}{\text{A tzero}}} \right){\text{ }} \ge {\text{ }}0{\text{ then}}:$$\end{document}
If
A test
-
A tzero
≥
0
then
:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$${\text{PG }} = {\text{ }}\left( {{\text{A test }}{-}{\text{ A tzero}}} \right)/\left( {{\text{A cont }}{-}{\text{ A tzero}}} \right){\text{ }} \times {\text{ 1}}00$$\end{document}
PG
=
A test
-
A tzero
/
A cont
-
A tzero
×
1
00
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$${\text{If }}\left( {{\text{A test }}{-}{\text{ A tzero}}} \right){\text{ }} < 0{\text{ then}}:$$\end{document}
If

\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$${\text{PG }} = {\text{ }}\left( {{\text{A test }}{-}{\text{ A tzero}}} \right)/{\text{A tzero}}){\text{ }} \times {\text{ 1}}00,$$\end{document}
PG
=
A test
-
A tzero
/
A tzero
)
×
1
00 ,
where A tzero is the average absorbance before exposure of cells to the test supstances, A test is the average absorbance after the incubation period (72 h), A cont is the average absorbance after 72 h with no exposure of cells to the test supstances.
